description:
The astronauts were desperate to find a way home. As the days passed, they began to run low on supplies and realized that they couldn't survive much longer without help. But no matter how hard they tried, they couldn't establish contact with Earth and didn't know if anyone knew they were there.

The astronauts began exploring the moon in search of anything that could help them survive or get back home. On one of their excursions, they discovered an ancient lunar base that had been abandoned for decades. As they explored the base, they found an old computer that was still functioning.

After hours of work, they were able to access a encrypted file on the computer. It was a message from a group of Earth scientists who had been studying the moon long before the astronauts arrived. In the message, the scientists talked about having discovered something incredible on the moon, something that could change the course of human history.

The astronauts couldn't believe what they were reading. Could there be something so important on the moon that the scientists had decided to leave it there? They decided to follow the clues in the message and explore the moon further in search of answers.

As they delved deeper and deeper into the moon, they began to uncover amazing and mysterious things. But they also started to feel like they were being watched. Was it just their nerves or was there something else there, in the darkness of the moon? Will the astronauts be able to uncover the great secret hidden on the moon and finally find a way home?
name: Lost on the moon
